holidays.title: Ascension of Bahau'llah
holidays.description: Get ready to partake in the special celebrations and festivities to mark the Ascension of Bahá’u’lláh!

holidays.title: End of the Middle Ages Day
holidays.description: The End of the Middle Ages is a day to celebrate innovation, culture, and enlightenment.

holidays.title: European Neighbors' Day
holidays.description: Invite over your neighbors to a nice meal and get to know your community!

holidays.title: International Day of UN Peacekeepers
holidays.description: Learn about the brave U.N. Peacekeepers who risk their lives to maintain order in the world.

holidays.title: Mount Everest Day
holidays.description: Mount Everest Day is an opportunity to celebrate the mountain and its brave climbers.

holidays.title: National Alligator Day
holidays.description: Get a little wet and wild with our not-so-friendly neighborhood lizards.

holidays.title: National Biscuit Day
holidays.description: Get your taste buds ready for National Biscuit Day right here, right now!

holidays.title: National Coq Au Vin Day
holidays.description: “A chicken in every pot,” said King Henry IV, and that’s the plan for today.

holidays.title: National Edison Day
holidays.description: Read on to know more about how you can brighten an Edison's day today.

holidays.title: National Heat Awareness Day
holidays.description: This health holiday cannot get any hotter — keep it cool on National Heat Awareness Day.

holidays.title: National Hydroxyapatite Day
holidays.description: Get your toothbrush ready, and don’t forget to floss to celebrate National Hydroxyapatite Day!

holidays.title: National Paperclip Day
holidays.description: The paperclip, in various forms, shapes, and sizes, has been around for a little under two centuries.

holidays.title: National Snail Day
holidays.description: National Snail Day is celebrated to show appreciation for snails and their many benefits.

holidays.title: Oak Apple Day
holidays.description: Today is Oak Apple Day, so get your oak apples and oak leaves ready!

holidays.title: Paperclip Day
holidays.description: Paperclip Day is celebrated to appreciate the item that helps us hold pieces of paper together.

holidays.title: Put a Pillow on your Fridge Day
holidays.description: Put a Pillow on Your Fridge Day is meant to bring you prosperity and good fortune.

holidays.title: World Digestive Health Day
holidays.description: Help us educate people on digestive diseases on World Digestive Health Day.

holidays.title: Carmelo Anthony’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s been the picture of ease on the basketball court for over twenty years.

holidays.title: John F. Kennedy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This former U.S. President can rest knowing he made some matchless achievements in his lifetime.
